enemy_illustration-30137001: This unit has bombardment capabilities at high health and places great survival pressure on friendly units. It is recommended that you deal with it swiftly.
enemy_illustration-20138001: An elite Paradeus unit, she is calm and cautious, possessing excellent judgement and the ability to control her emotions. She often fights alongside Grey and has great trust in her. She is adept at using her longsword for ambushes and assassination, and if the enemy exposes their weakness for even  a moment, she will seize on it and deliver a fatal blow with blinding speed.
enemy_illustration-30138001: This unit has terrifying killing and sustained combat ability. Friendly units with strong DPS should take care that she does not lock onto them.
enemy_illustration-20139001: An elite Paradeus unit, she is extremely charming and can easily break down her opponent's defense. She is still seductive even in her combat mode. She is skilled at confusing the hearts and neural clouds of humans and Dolls and possesses extremely high electronic warfare abilities. She can steal information while hacking a Doll's neural cloud and even cause them to crash.
enemy_illustration-30139001: This unit has the ability to steal neural clouds. Avoid being the target of her connections.
enemy_illustration-20140001: Intruder - Sorceress of the End is a Doll body specializing in military encounters that IOP created from simulation data gathered by extensive analysis and experimentation on Intruder. With new technology applied to her emotion module, not only does the Sorceress of the End model possess immense command and support capabilities, she can also instill crippling fear in her enemies' minds on a small battlefield, effectively destroying their morale.
enemy_illustration-30140001: Now that Intruder has switched to a witch-type body, she has greater combat support abilities, and both her firepower and command abilities have received an incremental upgrade.
enemy_illustration-20141001: I'm back from my gift shopping, please pay me for 119 presents... You want to know why you don't have to pay for the last one? That's because it's my gift to you.
enemy_illustration-30141001: This unit is very capable, please use the appropriate strategies against her.
enemy_illustration-20142001: I'm here to give you a gift, please cooperate and don't panic... Wait, so you're saying this makes people even more nervous? Sorry, Boss, force of habit.
enemy_illustration-30142001: This unit is very capable, please use the appropriate strategies against her.
enemy_illustration-20143001: Aw, in the end you still ended up in the palm of my hand.
enemy_illustration-30143001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20144001: I didn't know being Santa Claus would be so tricky... How does that fat old coot squeeze himself in, anyway?
enemy_illustration-30144001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20145001: Ah... I finally dug myself out... Hm? This is...? Uwah! Thank you, this is the best present ever!
enemy_illustration-30145001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20146001: Christmas sales are the real point of Christmas. Only discounted prices can multiply happiness~
enemy_illustration-30146001: This unit greatly reduces enemy echelon's critical rate while increasing allies' attack speed. She also deals telegraphed AOE damage that inflicts multiple hits on units occupying the corresponding tiles, so please use the appropriate strategies against her.
enemy_illustration-20147001: Destroyer - Dashing Reindeer is a specialized model developed for combat in snow, ensuring that Destroyer can maintain her high speed and accuracy even in the cold. This model also features enhanced firepower and explosive strength. At Destroyer's own forceful insistence, the appearance is based on a reindeer, and her ammo is packaged as Christmas hanging ornaments, so that she can deliver sweet death to her enemies.
enemy_illustration-30147001: This unit deals incredibly high single-target damage but has a low rate of fire and mediocre accuracy. T-Dolls with high evasion provide better defense against her.
enemy_illustration-20148001: An elite Nyto that is mass-produced by Avernus. She wields dual submachineguns and possesses the high mobility and firepower needed to handle daily patrol missions.
enemy_illustration-30148001: This unit will gain a certain amount of protection when receiving fatal damage. Be prepared for a battle of attrition.
enemy_illustration-20149001: An elite Nyto that is mass-produced by Avernus. She uses a massive hammer as a weapon, and after special modifications, the weapon can inflict stunning effects. Meanwhile, her frame also possesses greater defensive power.
enemy_illustration-30149001: This is a melee unit which can stun friendly units. Please address this with appropriate tactics.
enemy_illustration-20150001: An elite Nyto that is mass-produced by Avernus. She uses a sniper rifle as a primary weapon and can accurately strike fatal blows on her opponents' weaknesses from extremely long distances.
enemy_illustration-30150001: This unit primarily deals damage from the back row. It possesses above-average accuracy and piercing shots, and the damage it does to friendly units is stable but obvious. it is suggested that you deal with them by using Dolls whose action logic prioritized back-row  enemies.
enemy_illustration-20151001: An elite Nyto that is mass-produced by Avernus. She uses a tactical tablet to weaken her foes or strengthen her allies. She can support her teammates and increase their combat power.
enemy_illustration-30151001: This unit is an enemy tactical mastermind which will constantly buff all Nytos' fighting power, so it is recommended to kill it as a priority.
enemy_illustration-20152001: The latest model of mechanical hound that is mass-produced in Avernus. It is highly agile, mobile, and equipped with powerful teeth and claws.
enemy_illustration-30152001: This unit has high move speed and a strong protective effect on enemy units in the back row. We recommend destroying it first.
enemy_illustration-20153001: An elite agent from a frigid land. A one in a million talent who possesses a wealth of combat experience and a ruthless attitude.
enemy_illustration-30153001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20154001: This elite Paradeus unit is cunning and sinister, a master of disguise with many faces. Her accomplishments have awarded her a valuable chance for modification, and she has a body made with brand-new Paradeus technology. Her combat power has been greatly improved and her trapping technique has been upgraded as well. However, her virtual cognition image seems to have changed without her realizing...
enemy_illustration-30154001: Restricts the movement of friendly units while rapidly closing in and dealing great damage to them. However, approaching friendly forces also exposes herself to them, so take this opportunity to do lots of damage to her.
enemy_illustration-20155001: An elite Paradeus unit who is cold, unfeeling, clear of mind and self-aware. She occupies an irreplaceable position in Paradeus. She has short-range flight abilities and is skilled at disrupting enemies with electronic weapons, and over extended, painful torture, she fills her foes witrh despair and helplessness before slowly extinguishing their will to live.
enemy_illustration-30155001: This unit creates orbs of lights which can deal great damage to friendly units. Take note and defend against them.
enemy_illustration-20155002: An elite Paradeus unit who is cold, unfeeling, clear of mind and self-aware. She occupies an irreplaceable position in Paradeus. She has short-range flight abilities and is skilled at disrupting enemies with electronic weapons, and over extended, painful torture, she fills her foes witrh despair and helplessness before slowly extinguishing their will to live.
enemy_illustration-30155002: This unit creates orbs of lights which can deal great damage to friendly units. Take note and defend against them.
enemy_illustration-20156001: With the support of Paradeus' technology, RPK-16's modification is now partially complete. Although is still in an incomplete state, her firepower has been greatly enhanced and she can use certain Paradeus core technologies. Their effect on her neural cloud remains unknown.
enemy_illustration-30156001: An inconceivable enemy, please handle with care.
enemy_illustration-20157001: Hunter - Nightfall Moth is a uniquely-specialized assassination model. Her clothing incorporates structures similar to those of insect wing scales, and the colors they reflect can be adjusted in order to blend into the environment. In keeping with Hunter's personal preferences, they default to a cornflower blue color under normal circumstances, which seems to exert a certain degree of hypnotic effect. In combat, this effect is primarily shown by filling the air with blue flower petals or by suddenly changing the background. This also implies that by the time you see the abovementioned scenery, you have already stepped into Hunter's trap.
enemy_illustration-30157001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20158001: A dessertgate born from a production line that was modified by Persicaria. Its energy source is sweet snacks and it will cheerfully snatch away delicious desserts. While it is also very delicious in itself, one should take care not to chip their teeth on it.
enemy_illustration-30158001: A plunderer of snacks. Perhaps you could try feeding them some chocolates.
enemy_illustration-20159001: A massive ball of chocolate which emanates a delicious scent, its chopped almonds and the tempting lustre of its dark chocolate hint at its high-class deliciousness. However, it explodes easily, so please do not eat it.
enemy_illustration-30159001: In order to make itself larger, they go around looking for chocolate. However, they don't seem too stable. Try tossing a few chocolates-in-appearance-only at them and see what happens.
enemy_illustration-20160001: A massive ball of chocolate which emanates a delicious scent, its chopped almonds and the tempting lustre of its white chocolate hint at its high-class deliciousness. However, it explodes easily, so please do not eat it.
enemy_illustration-30160001: In order to make itself larger, they go around looking for chocolate. However, they don't seem too stable. Try tossing a few chocolates-in-appearance-only at them and see what happens.
enemy_illustration-20161001: A massive ball of chocolate which emanates a delicious scent, its gleaming surface has exquisite patterns drawn on it with melted chocolate, and the sweet flavor when it splits open can satisfy the most demanding palate.However, it explodes easily, so please do not eat it.
enemy_illustration-30161001: In order to make itself larger, they go around looking for chocolate. However, they don't seem too stable. Try tossing a few chocolates-in-appearance-only at them and see what happens.
enemy_illustration-20162001: After making a mistake and returning to her "nightmare", Destroyer is gradually losing her senses and only the temptation of chocolate remains. Can dogs eat chocolate?
enemy_illustration-30162001: The temptation of chocolate cannot be denied.
enemy_illustration-20163001: A simple-minded Lycan local with no particular talents and guards the sanctuary with pure brawn.
enemy_illustration-30163001: This unit has moderate armor and force field values. Though its initial damage reduction is insignificant, the force field will keep regenerating and getting stronger, so a prolonged battle is not a good idea if your echelon is incapable of breaking through its defenses. HOC support is strongly recommended.
enemy_illustration-20164001: A mysterious girl revered by the locals in Lycan as the "Seer". The amphibious high-pressure gun she wields seems to be her trusty hunting weapon.
enemy_illustration-30164001: Its force field provides damage reduction. While your front row units are fending off its damage, also keep an eye on its penetrating attack and make sure your frail damage dealers aren't standing behind your tanks. Support from the HOC will make this fight much easier.
enemy_illustration-20165001: A surfer who constantly wanders along the seaside of the Lycan Sanctuary, wielding a modified surfboard as a defensive weapon.
enemy_illustration-30165001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20166001: Alina - Mosasaur Rider is a specialized model for naval battles. Metal limbs, which are heavy and unwieldy in water, are replaced with lighter and more powerful ones, and both her outfit and construction materials are designed for optimal performance in naval warfare. As per Alina's own suggestion, a sharper and more nimble scythe inspired by an ancient marine creature from the Cretaceous Period has been forged to upgrade her weapon. With her giant scythe howling like a majestic beast, the pure white Goddess of Death is about to dive into the ocean, rending the ties between body and soul, reaping lives submerged in seawater.
enemy_illustration-20167001: A member of a violent criminal syndicate formed of nefarious villains who abide only by their own rules. They obtain their ends through whatever ruthless means necessary.
enemy_illustration-30167001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20168001: A light mech used by infantry, it features high-performance mobility systens which allow it to nimbly negotiate complex terrain. It is equipped with two large-caliber machine gun arms and boasts impressive firepower against infantry targets.
enemy_illustration-30168001: Deadly to low-health targets. Eliminate ASAP.
enemy_illustration-20169001: A missile carrier usable against air and ground targets. Equipped with a quad-linked Stinger anti-aircraft missile system. It possesses an extremely long range and has been widely employed against enemy airborne and armored ground targets.
enemy_illustration-30169001: This unit can enhance its defenses against mechanical units. Make sure you avoid the damage from its missiles.
enemy_illustration-20170001: A military support unit equipped with a high-velocity multi-barrel machine gun. It can provide powerful fire suppression and deal a lot of damage within its effective range.
enemy_illustration-30170001: This enemy has extremely high armor-piercing capability so be sure to fight it with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20171001: A modified and superior model of the Military's standard combat mech Cerynitis, now equipped with the latest long-range firing system. The defensive capability of its reactive armor has been enhanced, and its rapid-firing performance also sees a signficant boost.
enemy_illustration-30171001: This armored unit's attacks do big damage and inflict debuffs. It is recommended that you prioritize taking it out with RF Dolls.
enemy_illustration-20172001: A modified and superior model of the Military's standard combat unit Aegis. Equipped with a reactive armored shield that enhances its melee offensive capability, it is now more effective in breaching its enemies' defenses.
enemy_illustration-30172001: This armored unit does considerable melee damage. Make sure your echelon has enough armor-piercing capability before engaging it in battle.
enemy_illustration-20173001: An elite Paradeus unit. Tareus' general capabilities are unremarkable, but her talent in piloting mechs is unparalleled. She has named the mech with the highest synchronization rate "Miss Eve", the only name stored within her memory. Outside of combat, she disguises herself as an ordinary passer-by, but once she enters neural space, she annihilates everything in her path while piloting Miss Eve...
enemy_illustration-30173001: This unit has powerful defensive capability on top of ample firepower. Time your attack carefully and focus fire on her.
enemy_illustration-20174001: A boss of the Vory. She may be past the age of 50, but she is still spirited and mighty in battle. Dual wielding shotguns and driving her high-speed wheelchair, she can nimbly dodge obstacles in her way and make savage attacks on both her enemies and their wallets.
enemy_illustration-30174001: This unit will launch a rapid attack at the start of the battle, so make sure you position your units strategically and take care to evade her attack.
enemy_illustration-20175001: A specialized model for hunting and pursuit. At Executioner's own request, a large artificial limb that can transform into a scythe is incorporated into the design so that she can reap her enemies and wreak havoc effortlessly in battle. At the same time, her black clothing makes it easier to melt into the shadows as her weapon glints coldly behind her enemies' back. Have you seen the one who haunts your dreams? She emerges at night and stalks with death. She hunts down all madness that falls into nightmare.
enemy_illustration-30175001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20176001: Tareus, a specialized Nyto mech pilot, has an extremely high compatibility and synchronization rate with the mech "Miss Eve". She is also adept at hacking Dolls' neural clouds and unleashing devastating attacks on her targets. Since she has undergone numerous memory wipes and modifications, her virtual cognition image is very fragile and prone to severe mood swings, but her occasional emotional outbursts are always quickly neutralized by her internal programming.
enemy_illustration-30176001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20177001: An old machine on the verge of breaking down. However, being dressed with a strange pumpkin seems to have given it the ability to shove away all kinds of clutter.
enemy_illustration-30177001: This unit has weak armor and high moving speed. It starts deploying mines in the early stages of battle, causing massive damage upon contact with enemy Dolls. Take care to avoid the mines or destroy this unit ASAP.
enemy_illustration-20178001: A simple and crude tool for dusting all surfaces, but the rough movements simply send the dust flying everywhere... Sorry, there will be an additional charge for another cleaning.
enemy_illustration-30178001: This unit has a very high armor value. Make sure your echelon has enough armor piercing capability before engaging it in combat.
enemy_illustration-20179001: You can hire this chef for 90% off just for today - that is, if you don't mind it seasoning everything with mustard.
enemy_illustration-30179001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20180001: Former leader of Daybreak Squad, and the executioner of the "Dogtag" protocol. She is the most trusted subordinate of every commander she has served under, but in Amaris' eyes, she does not deserve this honor.
enemy_illustration-30180001: Help Amaris gather enough Moon Seals before challenging her!
enemy_illustration-20181001: Scarecrow - Demonic Abyss is a new model with enhanced firepower. With new upgrades, Scarecrow's hovering guns are capable of more powerful damage output. The command ports on her fingertips are also enhanced, strengthening the connection between Scarecrow and the hovering guns. The inspiration for her outfit is apparently a certain mythical beast that would wreak havoc in human villages at the end of each year. Its ferocious eyes would glow in the dark, and its sharp claws can tear through anything... just like Scarecrow.
enemy_illustration-20182001: A Sangvis specialized in gathering and analyzing intelligence. She isn't the best in direct confrontations, which earns her little respect among Sangvis Dolls. Rational, curt, and dutiful, she despises sentimentality and looks down on emotional Griffin Dolls who blindly follow their orders.
enemy_illustration-30182001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20183001: Mostly in charge of issuing commands and deploying units. Relatively high in rank, she is in command of combat units, yet is quite adept at combat herself. Answers directly to Agent. Serious, uptight, and meticulous, she always appears cool and businesslike both in speech and action. She holds herself to a code of honor even against her enemies.
enemy_illustration-30183001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20184001: A loner with high combat prowess that specializes in long-range attacks and fire support. A cheerful and energetic airhead of a girl who's always in high spirits. She isn't particularly antagonistic towards Griffin and doesn't always go out of her way to follow orders from Sangvis Ferri. However, her passion for bombardment and destruction still makes her a highly dangerous enemy.
enemy_illustration-30184001: This enemy deals high damage to flagged positions and splash damage to nearby units. Make sure you move your T-Dolls in time to evade her attacks.
enemy_illustration-20185001: In charge of liaising between Elisa and her Sangvis subordinates as well as logistics management. As a high-ranking unit adept at both combat and tactics, she's able to command all Dolls in combat, and they all directly answer to her. Calm and composed, she always speaks in a courteous tone to friends and foes alike. However, apart from the genuine respect she has for her master, she holds everyone else in low regard, especially Griffin.
enemy_illustration-30185001: When this unit activates her shield, penetrate it by concentrating your fire to stop her high-damage attack from charging.
enemy_illustration-20186001: An elite scout who often partners with Scarecrow but is slightly higher in rank. A rough-mannered and impulsive tomboy who takes delight in fair fights and dislikes bullying the weak.
enemy_illustration-30186001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20187001: An expert in blowing things up and disarming bombs who also possesses decent combat abilities. Occasionally teams up with Alchemist. She's usually haughty and sharp-tongued, but is actually a tsundere with a somewhat childish temper. She cries under pressure and is very sensitive about her height.
enemy_illustration-30187001: This unit deals incredibly high single-target damage but has a low rate of fire and mediocre accuracy. T-Dolls with high evasion provide better defense against her.
enemy_illustration-20188001: An intelligent Doll created after the Butterfly Incident with high combat capabilities, specializing in short-range assaults and defensive battles. But as the test subject in the developmental phase, her AI is very unstable and difficult to control. Possessing an overwhelming tactical and intellectual advantage over others, she is very self-assured and conceited, but she has little actual combat experience and is too unpredictable even for her allies, which makes her highly dangerous.
enemy_illustration-30188001: This unit deals high damage to flagged positions. Be sure to move your Dolls away in time to evade her attack.
enemy_illustration-20189001: Combat-oriented and possesses ultra long-range pinpoint sniping capability. A Doll created after the Buttlerfly Incident who answers directly to Elisa. Since she isn't designed to engage enemies directly, she spends most of her time hanging around Sangvis Ferri HQ and bullying Judge for her own amusement. Her charming smile is a flimsy disguise for her arrogance and capriciousness. She is extremely mentally unstable and egotistical, and is prone to becoming frenzied and losing control in battle. She has formidable destructive power and will often disregard her allies' safety. Fortunately, she rarely ever appears in direct combat.
enemy_illustration-30189001: This unit can fire from long range. Take your units' moving speed into consideration to prevent heavy losses suffered from spending too much time in motion.
enemy_illustration-20190001: Mobile and intelligent, she's skilled at harassment and pursuit battles. Her true power can only be shown when coordinating with Scarecrow and Executioner. She is calm and subdued, and cornering her foes through various means before capturing them alive. While she has an arrogant attitude toward Griffin, it does not preclude her from using overly despicable methods against them.
enemy_illustration-30190001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20191001: A Sangvis elite who specializes in all kinds of tactics and interrogations. Occasionally teams up with Destroyer. Arrogant, brash, and ruthless, she will do anything to achieve her goals. She has a sadistic streak and toys with Griffin Dolls to satisfy her perverse tendencies. However, her mental maturity still compels her to go the extra mile for her Sangvis companions.
enemy_illustration-30191001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20192001: In charge of providing battle strategies, yet also adept at decryption and sabotage. Relatively high in rank, she can directly issue commands to combat Dolls but answers to Gager. Her apparent poise and soft-spokenness mask a gaping sense of emptiness. She enjoys human theater and hopes to derive her own personality from it.
enemy_illustration-30192001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20193001: Command-oriented and responsible for Sangvis Ferri HQ's defense and security systems. She is essentially Elisa's bodyguard and only obeys Elisa's personal orders. A Doll created after the Butterfly Incident. Having to deal with Dreamer's antics every day gives her a headache. Stern and old-fashioned, she possesses a soldier's dignity and bearing. She is absolutely loyal to Elisa, but her short stature doesn't make her very imposing to most people. Anyone who points that out will suffer terribly, friend or foe.
enemy_illustration-30193001: This unit has a high rate of fire and attacks multiple targets simultaneously, but only deals moderate damage. Shotgun Dolls are recommended to provide adequate armor. Be sure to move out of purple areas in time to avoid taking continuous damage and getting debuffed.
enemy_illustration-20194001: Scarecrow - Demonic Abyss is a new model with enhanced firepower. With new upgrades, Scarecrow's hovering guns are capable of more powerful damage output. The command ports on her fingertips are also enhanced, strengthening the connection between Scarecrow and the hovering guns. The inspiration for her outfit is apparently a certain mythical beast that would wreak havoc in human villages at the end of each year. Its ferocious eyes would glow in the dark, and its sharp claws can tear through anything... just like Scarecrow.
enemy_illustration-20200001: A combat unit mainframe built in the form of a spider with high mobility. It is equipped with a large complement of smaller combat droids, which makes it a formidable opponent in both assaults and surprise encounters.
enemy_illustration-30200001: This unit with strong armor spawns clones to disrupt its enemies. It also has considerable defensive capability, so be sure to engage with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20201001: A small combat unit built in the form of a spider with extremely high mobility and offensive capability. It does devastating damage to both living and mechanical units. These units are spawned in large, unpredictable swarms, making them formidable enemies.
enemy_illustration-30201001: This unit has relatively high evasion and will close in on your echelon rapidly. Eliminate this unit early on in battle.
enemy_illustration-20202001: A fortress-type ultra-heavy combat droid that can transport land forces. It also possesses strategic-level battlefield attack capabilities, making it an advanced combat unit that can easily tip the scales in battles.
enemy_illustration-30202001: In addition to having powerful defensive capability, this unit is also capable of making decent AoE attacks. It is recommended that you prioritize eliminating this unit.
enemy_illustration-20203001: An engineer-type combat droid. It is not particularly lethal or destructive on its own, but as a support unit for other enemies, it can cause quite the headache. Its drone is constantly monitoring the battlefield from above.
enemy_illustration-30203001: This unit will keep spawning drones to gain an advantage in combat. Do not let the battle drag on for too long.
enemy_illustration-20204001: Paradeus' newest ultra-heavy mech unit. It is capable of doing devastating damage from long, mid, and short range, making it an all-rounder in combat and a dreadful opponent.
enemy_illustration-30204001: This armored unit is extremely versatile in combat. Make sure you time your attacks carefully to eliminate it.
enemy_illustration-20205001: Similar to the Gunner, but with improved firepower. The harder-hitting weapon comes at the cost of reduced mobility.
enemy_illustration-30205001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20206001: An elite Paradeus unit who looks like a frail and delicate girl, but once she dons her custom-made mask and mounts her personal mech, you will wish you could run faster.
enemy_illustration-30206001: This unit has the ability to cause severe disruption on the battlefield. Make sure you engage with a suitable echelon.
enemy_illustration-20206002: An elite Paradeus unit who looks like a frail and delicate girl, but once she dons her custom-made mask and mounts her personal mech, you will wish you could run faster.
enemy_illustration-30206002: This unit has the ability to cause severe disruption on the battlefield. Make sure you engage with a suitable echelon.
enemy_illustration-20207001: An assassin of unknown origin affiliated with Paradeus. He is a bizarre patchwork of man and machine. The technology employed in his creation seems to be different from what can be found on other Paradeus units.

enemy_illustration-20208001: A Dummy of M4A1, but without her indecisiveness. It obeys without question.
enemy_illustration-20209001: A Dummy of ST AR-15. Other than the missing sneer, it looks no different from the mainframe.
enemy_illustration-20210001: A Dummy of M4 SOPMOD II. Its operation logic is completely identical to the mainframe. It even has the same terrifying laugh.

enemy_illustration-30225001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20233001: A pixelated entity of unknown origin. It is vicious, unpredictable, and possesses all sorts of powers from this strange world. All in all, a strong and dangerous one.
enemy_illustration-20234001: After abandoning Sangvis Ferri, Elisa has become crueler, more ruthless, and even closer to a perfect AI. When there is nothing to lose, there is nothing to fear.
enemy_illustration-30234001: The Reverse Collapse effect might render your Dolls unable to fight, but floating in the air is also a form of protection. Make use of this to evade otherwise unavoidable damage!
enemy_illustration-20235001: With the support of Paradeus' technology, RPK-16's modification is now partially complete. Although is still in an incomplete state, her firepower has been greatly enhanced and she can use certain Paradeus core technologies. Their effect on her neural cloud remains unknown.
enemy_illustration-30235001: This unit can command multiple Paradeus combat units. Engage with caution!
enemy_illustration-20236001: Gager - Seaside Combat Specialist type, or VWV for short, is a specialized frame modified and optimized for naval combat based on Gager's original frame. If Gager is not near the sea, she will modify the surrounding environment to that of a seaside-like environment using stored material before commencing combat. The anchor-like weapon allows her to dole out brutal firepower while also providing the ability to summon wind waves.
enemy_illustration-30236001: Now having switched to a naval combat frame, Gager boasts stronger combat engineering abilities and an improvement to firepower and command ability.
enemy_illustration-20237001: The Military's regular combat mech. Upgraded and modified from the "Nemeum", it is outfitted with a military-grade long-range firing system, giving it even stronger armor and higher rapid-fire capabilities.
enemy_illustration-30237001: There is little pause between attacks from this armored unit, which deals significant damage. It is recommended to prioritize killing them with Rifle T-Dolls.
enemy_illustration-20238001: A regular military mech modified to the German army's requirements. Equipped with upgraded armor and a military-use long-range fire control system, the fearsome main cannons are effective in sweeping enemy positions with devastating firepower.
enemy_illustration-30238001: Best to avoid this if your echelon is not in good condition.
enemy_illustration-20239001: The German army's locally-produced specialist mech. With the ability to effectively disrupt the enemy whilst protecting itself, the Loki is often used as an ace in the hole for tactical suppression.
enemy_illustration-30239001: This unit possesses a certain degree of armor, so make sure your echelon has enough armor piercing and try to maximize your defenses in the front row. In addition, take care to move units targeted by its powerful cannon shot to prevent your backliners from taking damage.
enemy_illustration-20240001: The German army's regular combat Doll, equipped with an assault rifle and a grenade launcher with relatively high firepower. Its armor is weaker compared to other similar models.
enemy_illustration-30240001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20241001: The German army's regular combat Doll, equipped with a shotgun and ballistic shield.
enemy_illustration-30241001: This unit is well-balanced and has significant armor. Engage with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20242001: The German army's regular combat Doll, equipped with a rifle. It boasts ample long-range firepower.
enemy_illustration-30242001: This unit is responsible for doling out firepower from the backline. To take them out, the utilization of Dolls who prioritize targeting the backline is recommended.
enemy_illustration-20243001: The German army's support combat Doll, equipped with a multi-barrel machine gun with high fire rate. It boasts the ability to lay down strong firepower and suppression within a certain effective range.
enemy_illustration-30243001: This enemy has extremely high armor-piercing capability so be sure to fight it with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-20244001: The German army's light mech, able to deftly adapt to complex terrain. It features two large-caliber gun-arms and can deal impressive amounts of damage to infantry.
enemy_illustration-30244001: Deadly to low-health targets. Eliminate ASAP.
enemy_illustration-20245001: The German army's multipurpose missile vehicle with ground-to-air defense capabilities. It is equipped with quadruple "Thagomizer" anti-air missiles, which are widespread in use for anti-air operations as well as destroying armored targets on the ground.
enemy_illustration-30245001: This unit can enhance its defenses against mechanical units. Make sure you avoid the damage from its missiles.
enemy_illustration-20246001: A regular military combat Doll modified to the German army's requirements. Equipped with a shield fitted with reactive armor, it can also be used as an offensive weapon. Close combat capabilities have also been improved, allowing this Doll to be quite effective in breaking through enemy defenses.
enemy_illustration-30246001: This armored unit does considerable melee damage. Make sure your echelon has enough armor-piercing capability before engaging it in battle.
enemy_illustration-20247001: An elite unit belonging to Paradeus. She watches passing guests from behind the curtain like a hiding phantom, seemingly appearing to be nothing but just another attached noblewoman. In truth, she has long marked her quarry amidst all the chatter, sealing the target's death in stone.
enemy_illustration-30247001: This unit has skills that can result in certain death, please exercise caution!
enemy_illustration-20248001: Beneath the seductive and beautiful veneer lies an unmistakably dangerous aura; her unpredictable whip is just like a venomous snake's flicking tongue... Beware, for she has already locked onto your scent.
enemy_illustration-130011001: Kill this unit promptly by activating your T-Dolls' skills once he closes in.
enemy_illustration-130012001: This unit deals considerable burning damage to flagged positions. Be sure to move your Dolls in time to evade his attacks.
enemy_illustration-130013001: Keep a close eye on this unit's movements. Attract his attention with Dolls that are close to him and direct your Dolls to avoid the AoE damage caused by his flamethrower.
enemy_illustration-130014001: Hinder this units' movements and defeat him before he approaches your formation.
enemy_illustration-130015001: This unit deals considerable projectile damage to flagged positions. Be sure to move your Dolls in time to evade his attacks. It is also advised to confront him with an echelon that has decent survivability.
enemy_illustration-130016001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-130017001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness.
enemy_illustration-130018001: This unit deals projectile damage to flagged positions and places debuffs on affected targets. Be sure to move your Dolls on the back row in time to evade his attacks.
enemy_illustration-130019001: Engineers set up mortars that pose a large threat and deal AoE damage that could be a bother to deal with for your units.
enemy_illustration-130020001: Dolls with sticky bombs must be moved to an unoccupied area or they will cause significant damage to other friendly units.
enemy_illustration-130021001: This enemy is well-balanced so be sure to fight her with an echelon that has adequate overall combat effectiveness. Yep.
